email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Yokohama on FOB terms. Could you provide a quote and confirm vessel availability?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN BREEZE, DWT 45,000, LOA 180m, for your shipment. The rate is USD 25 per MT. Laycan is 25-30 October. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 25 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Given the current market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 22 per MT. Demurrage is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 48 hours. Let me know if you need any more details.

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

USD 22 sounds better. Can we lock in the OCEAN BREEZE with a laycan of 25-30 October? Please send over the charter party for review.

Thanks,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best,
Liam
